Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
American Student Assistance® (ASA) is nonprofit dedicated to helping people realize their higher education dreams in a financially responsible way.
If you have any questions, please email us at AskASA@asa.org. You can also find more information around managing your money, paying for school, and repaying student loans on saltmoney.org.
Thank you,
American Student Assistance
